data.content:
Danh từ
người dự thảo
(từ Mỹ) (như draughtsman)
xem draughtsman

noun
/ˈdræftsmən, Brit ˈdrɑːftsmən/ , pl draftsmen /ˈdræftsmən, Brit ˈdrɑːftsmən/
[count] US draftsman or Brit draughtsman :a person whose job is to make drawings that will be used to make machines, buildings, etc.
someone who writes an official or legal document (such as a law) based on the ideas that have been officially discussed
the draftsmen [=(more commonly) drafters] of the U.S. Constitution
US draftsman or Brit draughtsman :an artist who draws well
Her use of color is not outstanding, but she is a first-rate draftsman.
